name: Agent Hunter Game
description:
Agent Hunter is an overhead view driving combat game. You need to hunt down the enemy spied before they get you.

The object of the game is to drive down roads in your advanced "hunter" car, and destroy various enemy vehicles with a variety of weapons at your disposal. Your car is fitted with a machine gun, as well as smoke machine. But watch out, the enemy cars are also fitted out with the latest weapons.

Available for both your iPhone and iPad.

No advertising, and no in-app purchasing means you get the entire game for one low price.
